Describe your issue: I'm having issues upgrading to canva pro. Says to contact.

Describe your issue: I am unable to upgrade to Canva Pro. The error messages says to contact Canva support.

Describe your issue: I am being billed every month and I don't have an upgraded account.

Describe your issue: I have an active subscription for Canva Pro but within the app it asks me to sign up for it then I receive a message saying that I already have an account and when the next billing date is.
Followed by an error message saying to contact support.
My subscription is managed via the Apple App store.

Describe your issue: Hi, I wanted to upgrade but it’s not letting me, is says an error and to contact you.

Describe your issue: I have changed phones & cannot seem to get my Upgrade to Premium on the new handset please help

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cannot upgrade to Canva Pro. I have already contacted the support yet I have received no support.  I tried filling out the form to contact the help desk but it shows an error every time I fill in the form.  Please can someone help me?  What is wrong with my account?  Should I cancel everything and start again?

Hi there, 

I am getting an error message when trying to pay for canva pro sub - it says to contact customer support which leads to FAQs page and no contact  number. I had to get this email address from someone's twitter post!?! Can you please help?

Share accurate information on COVID-19 and spread messages of support to your community.

Fabiola Litherland
